content: this adorable crochet squirrel toy is stitched in pieces and then stuffed and sewn together created in plush bernat blanket the head and body feature simple shaping and crochet colorwork shirley holds a big juicy strawberry ready for a picnic learn working in the round single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet simple increases and decreases and more she s sure to bring a smile to any child s face materials bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a tan pink 10898 1 ball contrast b vintage white 10006 1 ball bernat® blanket™ 5 3 oz/150 g 108 yds/98 m contrast c cranberry 00705 1 ball bernat® blanket™ brights 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast d go-go green 12004 1 ball measurement approx 14 35 5 cm tall
